parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided text.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions Adrian Cozma, the president of the PNL (National Liberal Party) in Satu Mare.  This directly refers to a candidate participating in elections, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and the content is presented as a news article, aiming to reach a wide audience, not just a specific individual. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>Potentially True. While presented as a news article, the content focuses on negative aspects of a specific candidate (Adrian Cozma) from the PNL.  The inclusion of a link to a full article suggests an intention to influence public opinion, potentially negatively impacting Cozma's electoral prospects. This raises concerns about fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c, as the objective could be interpreted as influencing the vote.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>Partially True. The post is formatted like a news headline and includes a link to a news article. However, the highly critical and potentially defamatory nature of the headline raises questions about its journalistic objectivity. The focus seems to be on damaging the reputation of a specific candidate rather than providing balanced, unbiased information.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post does not express a personal opinion; instead, it presents information in a way that suggests a negative portrayal of a political figure. The lack of personal pronouns and the use of a news-style headline indicate an attempt to present the information as factual rather than opinion-based.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>3870108766578700</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, while formatted as a news article, exhibits characteristics of electoral propaganda. It directly mentions a specific candidate (Adrian Cozma, PNL), uses a potentially defamatory headline to negatively portray him, and aims for wide reach through a paid Facebook advertisement.  While the post links to a longer article, the headline itself is concise and designed to create a negative impression. The paid nature of the post, targeting a significant audience in Satu Mare County, further strengthens the argument that it is intended to influence voters.  The lack of clear journalistic objectivity and the potential for defamation raise serious concerns.  The "in dubio pro reo" principle should be considered, but the evidence strongly suggests an attempt to influence the election.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Adrian Cozma</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Gazeta de Nord-Vest</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Gazeta de Nord-Vest, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul 3870108766578700, care conține afirmații defăimătoare la adresa candidatului Adrian Cozma, președintele PNL Satu Mare, prezentate într-un mod care sugerează o intenție clară de a influența votul alegătorilor.  Titlul postării, "Camorra de Satu Mare partea a II-a. Grupul infracțional organizat din jurul președintelui PNL Adrian Cozma", este extrem de sugestiv și are un efect electoral negativ asupra candidatului menționat.  Postarea, cu o estimare a vizualizărilor între 45.000 și 50.000, a fost plătită cu o sumă cuprinsă între 500 și 599 RON, conform datelor din Ad Library, și a vizat o audiență semnificativă din județul Satu Mare.  Aceste acțiuni constituie propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei legale, având ca scop influențarea votului în mod negativ asupra candidatului Adrian Cozma.  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt publicitate@gazetanord-vest.ro și +40747640578.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
